title: Constructivist-Based Mobile Microlearning Course in Advertising Photography

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary photography techniques and competency in digital tool utilization
context.additional_context: Blended learning course for advanced professionals with managerial/leadership roles, conducted in a digital device-provided environment

learning_goals: Learners can complete collaborative artifacts from advertising photo planning to production according to constructivist principles
Learners can improve photo works by reflecting on real-time feedback through microlearning content (15 minutes, twice weekly) using mobile devices
Learners advance advertising photo direction strategies by exchanging feedback with peers using online collaboration tools (Google Classroom, etc.)
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
